cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting Asn1_verbosity to an invalid enum value will cause initialization failure during ASN.1 processing.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Asn1_verbosity 設定為無效的枚舉值會在 ASN.1 處理期間導致初始化失敗。
